remarks: Lemma for transfinite recursion.  Compute the value of ` C ` . (Contributed by NM, 18-Aug-1994.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-May-2015.)
statement:
tfrlem.1 $e |- A = { f | E. x e. On ( f Fn x /\ A. y e. x ( f ` y ) = ( F ` ( f |` y ) ) ) } $.
tfrlem.3 $e |- C = ( recs ( F ) u. { <. dom recs ( F ) , ( F ` recs ( F ) ) >. } ) $.
tfrlem11 $p |- ( dom recs ( F ) e. On -> ( B e. suc dom recs ( F ) -> ( C ` B ) = ( F ` ( C |` B ) ) ) ) $.
$d B f x y $.
$d C f x y $.
$d F f x y $.
